quest.name: A Many-splendored Thing
journal:
Astrid is embracing her role as an emissary for House Valentione.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Astrid shares with you her plan to expand the scope of the Valentione's Ceremony to include love of all persuasions─romantic, familial, and platonic alike. She hands you some handwritten invitations of dubious quality, and asks that you distribute them across Gridania to those in obvious need of the festival's affectionate embrace.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
After a quick jaunt around New and Old Gridania, you finish handing out your surprisingly small pile of ceremony invitations. Astrid waits at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to thank you for your service.

Even as Astrid gushes about the growing number of ceremony participants, you bear witness to an ugly argument between two friends who have recently completed the affinity test. Unable to bear the thought of love's flame sputtering out on this most holy of House Valentione occasions, Astrid begs you chase Lisie towards the Whistling Miller. Meanwhile, she will attempt to persuade Taggy to salvage her friendship before she departs for far-off Ul'dah.
You speak with the distraught Lisie, and she takes great comfort in sharing her feelings with you. Mortified by her outburst, Lisie returns to the amphitheatre to apologize to Astrid.

The two friends have been reunited for the moment, but not entirely convinced by Astrid's suggested course of action. They ask that you participate in the ceremony yourself so that they can observe your performance and gain a better idea of where they went wrong.

When you are ready, the House Valentione servant will escort you to the venue. At the ceremony's conclusion, you will receive a Valentione's Day chocolate, which Astrid bids you bring to her.

Astrid praises your performance in the ceremony, and assures Lisie and Taggy that they are more than capable of the same degree of patience and consideration. After a brief and open discussion, the two friends realize they were approaching their coming separation with different mindsets, which thus affected their affinity results. Astrid is thrilled to see their friendship forged anew, and showers upon you, her champion of love, all the blessings of House Valentione.
objectives: Hand out ceremony invitations in Old Gridania.
Hand out ceremony invitations in New Gridania.
Speak with Astrid at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
Speak with Lisie near the Whistling Miller.
Complete the Valentione's Ceremony and show the Valentione's Day chocolate to Astrid.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Do you not feel it in the air, adventurer? 'Tis Valentione's Day, and love, uh...runs rampant through the streets!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: We of House Valentione have returned to spread our message of Ardor and Affection, and honor the pure pursuits of our ancestor, Countess Arabelle.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: The true heart of the festivities, of course, is the Valentione's Ceremony!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I shudder to think what might have befallen this wondrous tradition had you not offered me a helping hand the last time. Thanks to you, however, the people of Gridania were enraptured by the results!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I shudder to think what might have befallen this wondrous tradition had your fellow adventurers not offered me a helping hand the last time. Thanks to them, however, the people of Gridania were enraptured by the results!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Yet one must always strive to dream bigger, wouldn't you agree?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I aspire to bring joy to more folk than ever before, and for that I shall need the aid of a stalwart assistant. A champion of love, if you will!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Pray say you'll help me─I've learned only too well how foolish it is to flail about by oneself...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh, praise your generous soul! I am sure that with your discerning adventurer's eye, you will soon spy those most in need of a friendly shove towards love!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: To that end, I would have you hand deliver these ceremony invitations to those who seem especially bereft of the ties of affection.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Astrid hands you a sheaf of invitations penned in a shaky hand and illustrated with crude pictures of what might generously be termed “moogles.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: (-Ceremony Invitation-)Be it familial or romantic, betwixt lifelong friends or serendipitous strangers, all love is to be celebrated! Join us in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre and partake in the festivities!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: As you can see, I'm hoping to draw in a more varied crowd this year.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: The Valentione's Ceremony shouldn't be only for those who have exchanged the vows of matrimony...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: It...it should be for everyone! Yes! (Light and airy, Astrid, light and airy.)

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Go forth, my champion of love! Scour the corners of Gridania for those who seem bereft of affection and attention!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Sweep through the streets of Gridania, and deliver those invitations to the emotionally downtrodden!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: <sigh> ...I know not how much longer I can keep up this cheery facade. But I must not disappoint Sister! (Smile and wave, Astrid, smile and wave.)

dialogue.name: YOUNGGRIDANIAN03205
dialogue.text: What can I do for you, misssir? It's been a dreary eveningmorningday, to be honest, and I'd welcome a spot of excitement.

dialogue.name: YOUNGGRIDANIAN03205
dialogue.text: ...Oh, the Valentione's Day celebrations. I've no one to take, so it's not really for someone like m─

dialogue.name: YOUNGGRIDANIAN03205
dialogue.text: Hm? What's this about serendipitous strangers? P-Perhaps I'll just drop by for a moment or two, then...

dialogue.name: OLDGRIDANIAN03205
dialogue.text: Now, what could a lovely young lassstrapping young lad like you want with an old grumbler like me?

dialogue.name: OLDGRIDANIAN03205
dialogue.text: Well, that's a charming little invitation, isn't it? Seems they've made Valentione's Day more of a family affair.

dialogue.name: OLDGRIDANIAN03205
dialogue.text: ...I wonder if my grandchild might enjoy the celebrations. It's my first time being a grandparent, you see, and I never know what to do with the wee scamp. Could be worth a look!

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Yes? Can we help you with something?

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Ah, the Valentione's Day celebrations. Isn't that an event for couples, though?

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: But, look! The invitation says anyone is welcome this year. We could go together! You know, before you leave me behind and move to Ul'dah...

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Lisie, please, do we have to discuss this in front of strangers?

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, I'm leaving to begin an apprenticeship in weaving, and someone is having trouble being happy for me...

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Still, I've always wanted to try my hand at that beautiful ceremony, and it would make for a nice send-off. Shall we go?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: There shehe is! Our champion of love! Your honest words and gentle demeanor have encouraged all manner of townspeople to attend our event.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: There was one lonely gentleman who seemed terribly unsure until I introduced him to another forlorn participant. 'Twas a Valentione miracle how swiftly their shyness melted away!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I also spied an old man and his granddaughter, who barely spoke two words to each other when they arrived. But by the end of the ceremony, they were giggling together like a couple of mischievous moogles!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: And even as we speak, a pair of lovely lasses are enjoying our affinity trials. They should be back any moment now!

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: (-???-)Ugh, that was horrible! How could we be so out of tune with each other!? I wish we'd never come!

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Well, what did you expect, Taggy? You just kept forging ahead without even looking to see where I was...

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Well, you were plodding along like an overfed adamantoise! We were never going to reach the goal at that pace!

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: And simply rushing through was the better strategy? If you had slowed down a touch, we might have had a better chance of winning the trial! Ugh, never mind...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: That isn't how it was supposed to go! And they were so excited to try the ceremony together... What could have happened to put them at such odds in there?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: They said something about “marking the occasion.” Do you have any idea as to what this occasion might be?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I see. They wanted to do something special before Taggy left for Ul'dah...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: 'Tis unthinkable that these close friends would fail the ceremony so completely. 'Tis all a simple misunderstanding, I'm sure of it.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Nay, I cannot bear to think of them parting ways like this...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: And what is more, I have a duty as an emissary of House Valentione. Adventurer, you and I will see the rift between these ladies mended! Understood!?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Understood!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It's not our place to intervene.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What happened to “light and airy”?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Mayhap this falls into the realm of meddling, but if we have a chance to save them from sadness, should we not at least try!?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: There is no time for flowery phrasing! We have to avert this Valentione's Day disaster before it is too late!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! I knew your kind heart would not let you ignore such a travesty!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I will speak to Taggy, whilst you catch up to Lisie. The last I saw, she was running off towards the Whistling Miller!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Lisie was running in the direction of the Whistling Miller. If you hurry, you should be able to catch her before it is too late!

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: I'm sorry, but I'm not in the mood for talking. Just...leave me be.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Oh, I know you─you're that adventurer who was handing out ceremony invitations.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I came at Astrid's behest.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: This time I come not to invite, but to plead on love's behalf...

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Ah... You overheard our argument, didn't you? How awfully embarrassing.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Taggy and I have been friends since we were children, and this is the first time we are to live so far apart. I just...I wanted these last moments to be special.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: But in my efforts to create the perfect memory, I may have been too cautious. And that is when the problems began...

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: <sigh> I feel a burden has lifted from my shoulders. Thank you for listening, adventurer.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: I feel I should apologize to that tiny Valentione girl for our wretched behavior. I assume she is still in the amphitheatre?

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: That Valentione girl is a passionate little thing, isn't she? I was subjected to a tearful request to make peace with Lisie...

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Thank you again for listening. I've yet to make my apologies to young Astrid here...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: My thanks, adventurer. You have brought back Lisie, and given these two friends the chance to undo the hurt which was done!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Attempt the ceremony once more, and let angry words be forgotten!

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: I only returned to offer an apology for souring the day with our quarrel. Testing our affinity again will likely give us the same result, or worse...

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: And I only came back because your plaintive tears would be satisfied with nothing less. I did not agree to another run through that trial.

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: But, perhaps... Perhaps if we could see how others completed the ceremony, we might stand a better chance.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Then I should be happy to serve as an example! Allow me to fetch my sibling, Lisette, and we shall display the pinnacle of sisterly affection!

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Uh, whilst we appreciate the offer, I wonder if a performance by the very people who run the ceremony might be a little too perfect for us to emulate...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh... I hadn't thought of that...

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: What if we have the adventurer here show us how it's done? You already know our situation, so would you mind helping us out a little more?

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: I doubt it matters who you take─I imagine someone of your kind nature could produce a good result with almost anyone.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: What a fabulous idea! I'm certain if you see how effortlessly shehe navigates the twists and turns of affinity, then you'll soon find yourself yearning to take another turn!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Your quest awaits, my champion of love! Find a partner with whom you wish to attempt the test, and return with a Valentione's Day chocolate as proof of your deed!

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Thank you for doing this for us. We only want to see how other participants handle the course, so please enjoy the ceremony in whatever way you normally would.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Valentione's Ceremony seasonal instance! To enter the venue, speak with the House Valentione servant at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Valentione's Ceremony is an instance designed for a party of two. There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In the event that you register for the ceremony alone, your partner will be found via the matching system.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: We shall all be watching you with heart-shaped eyes, and waiting for you to return with your victorious piece of Valentione's Day chocolate!

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Show us how it's done, adventurer. Have you chosen a partner yet?

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: The affinity test can be so intimidating. I wonder how they will rate you...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Welcome back! We were all holding our breath in anticipation of your success! You've brought the chocolate, yes...?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Thank you, adventurer─such an inspiring performance!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: As I am sure you saw, successful completion of the Valentione's Ceremony hinges upon showing your partner a certain degree of patience and consideration.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: But I refuse to believe such fine friends as you are incapable of such a feat. Nay, 'twas simply that you approached the challenge with two slightly different mindsets.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Thus, I implore you...beseech you...beg you...to give your love one more chance...

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: I think you've the right of it, Astrid, thank you.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: It was my fault, Taggy. I was more concerned with the result than simply enjoying the event itself. I wanted so badly to make our last memory together a good one...

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Our last memory...? Ah, that's why you were being so anxious about our every move.

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: It was my fault, too, then─I didn't realize how much this meant to you.

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: But I never thought this would be our final farewell. After all, I can always hop on an airship and come back to visit.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Oh...I suppose that's true. What a silly goose I've been.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Will you take another turn with me, then? Just for fun this time?

dialogue.name: TAGGY
dialogue.text: Of course I will.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Our thanks, Astrid. If you'd not been so unwilling to give up on our friendship, we may have parted ways for good.

dialogue.name: LISIE
dialogue.text: Our thanks to you as well, adventurer.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Whilst we're speaking of gratitude, I cannot express how much House Valentione owes you for making our event such a grand success!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Thank you, advent─

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Ahem. Your deeds have warmed our hearts, my champion of love! May ardor and affection follow you this day, and all the days to follow!
